resources.string: A new version of the E-ticket tile is available specifically for your new Android System.\nPlease proceed with the update.

First, we need to put the E-ticket tile identifier in your Clipboard. To this end, just click the button below.
Identifier copied in your Clipboard.\nPlease proceed to step 2.
Swipe down twice on your device\'s status bar, and long click the Settings icon to activate the System UI Tuner menu.
Long press Settings for unlocking the System UI Tuner menu
Open and scroll all the way down your Settings menu and select System UI Tuner, and then Quick Settings.
Click Add tile and select Broadcast Tile. Paste the E-ticket tile identifier copied in step 1 and validate.
You may also drag and drop the tile in this panel to move it around as you\'d like.
